# GRAPHICS::CASCADE_SHADOWS_SET_DYNAMIC_DEPTH_MODE

## Summary
Call this to change the cascade shadows so they are placed dependant on the nearest object in the scene from the previous frame

## Parameters
* **BOOL** enable
